name: EnelXSmartPlug
0:
”Alexa, turn on the JuiceBox please”
”Alexa, turn off the JuiceBox please”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
## About this skill ##
This skill allows EV drivers to use Enel X charging solutions with the Amazon family of products to start and stop charging their JuiceNet-compatible EV chargers. For additional features, use the Enel X EV Charging skill.

## Requirements ##
In order to use this skill, you need to own a JuiceNet-compatible EV charger. This includes: Enel X JuiceBox EVSEs, Enel X JuicePlug adapters, Clipper Creek HCS JuiceNet edition, and a growing list of other charging stations from a variety of manufacturers. For more details and a list of compatible charging stations, please visit https://evcharging.enelx.com/.

## About Enel X ##
Enel X is an innovative Silicon Valley provider of electric vehicle (EV) charging solutions built upon a disruptive business model: by selling our market-leading JuiceBox smart-grid EV charging stations into a rapidly-expanding electric vehicle market, we provide immediate benefit to EV owners and charging station operators while simultaneously delivering valuable, cloud-based load management services to utilities and grid operators. As a result, drivers receive fast, IoT charging and Enel X shares in “energy services” value generated by these distributed energy resources.

Our mission is to dramatically accelerate EV adoption through advanced technologies and innovative solutions. The company's flagship residential product, a connected level 2 EV charging station and mobile app, has already helped over 35,000 drivers go electric.

## Disclaimer ##
The Alexa skill might not be suitable for those under the age of owning a driving permit and not yet able to own an electric vehicle. It is unsuitable for those that do not won a JuiceNet-powered EV charger.
